item.title: Configuring integrations
item.description: Mailchimp Advanced Forms Pro enables you to connect forms to Mailchimp and subscribe your visitors to Mailchimp lists. Configuring Mailchimp is easy, all you need is an API key. Generating an API Key Start by logging in to your Mailchimp account on mailchimp.com. Click your profile name in the top right corner and select Account. Navigate to API Keys under the Extras tab and press the Create a Key button. Lastly, copy the newly generated key.
